note: I am a mental health professional (LPCC-S) providing tips and tricks for managing mood and building healthy relationships, as well as working to spread awareness of mental health topics as a whole. My partner is a certified personal trainer and nutritionist (when she isn't busy as an EMT captain or doing her regular day job). We work to help people reach their wellness goals, whether that is to eat healthier, get physically stronger, or learn to better cope with stressors.
